blocks.name: cnvordtrestixx
blocks.content: The restriction of the 'greater than' order to an interval gives the same topology as the subspace topology. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvordtrestixx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c0), cfv(cordt, cin(ccnv(cle), cxp(c0, c0))))
  -| wss(c0, cxr)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wss(co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtr2i(co(cfv(cordt, cle), crest, c0), cfv(cordt, cin(ccnv(cle), cxp(c0, c0))), co(cfv(cordt, ccnv(cle)), crest, c0))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cordt, cin(ccnv(cle), cxp(c0, c0))), co(cfv(cordt, ccnv(cle)), crest, c0)))
  ordtrest2(s1, s0, hs0, ccnv(cle), c0, cxr, wtru)
  eqtri(cxr, cdm(ccnv(cle)), crn(cle))
  lern()
  df-rn(cle)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(ccnv(cle), ctsr))
  ax-mp(wcel(ccnv(cle), ctsr), wcel(cle, ctsr))
  cnvtsr(cle)
  a1i(wtru, wss(c0, cxr))
  adantl(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0)))), c0))
  eqsstrd(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0)))), c0, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  rabbidva(hs0, cxr, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0))))
  anbi12d(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)))
  adantlr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(cle), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))
  brcnvg(cv(s1), c0, cv(hs0), cxr, cle)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cle), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simpr(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  simplr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  brcnvg(cv(hs0), cxr, cv(s0), c0, cle)
  ancom(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)))
  eqsstr3d(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))), c0, co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr))
  sseldi(cv(s0), cxr, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sseldi(cv(s1), cxr, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpl(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  iccval(hs0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(co(cv(s0), cicc, cv(s1)), c0))
  oveq1i(cfv(cordt, ccnv(cle)), crest, c0, cfv(cordt, cle))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cordt, ccnv(cle)), cfv(cordt, cle)), wcel(cle, cps))
  ax-mp(wcel(cle, cps), wcel(cle, ctsr))
  letsr()
  tsrps(cle)
  ordtcnv(cle)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(cle))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
}

thm cnvordtrestixx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t]c0)=(ordTop `(`' ‚â§ ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c0)))
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù*
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(s0[[,]]s1)‚äÜ c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtr2i(((ordTop ` ‚â§)[|`t]c0), (ordTop `(`' ‚â§ ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c0))), ((ordTop ` `' ‚â§)[|`t]c0))
  mptru((ordTop `(`' ‚â§ ‚ãÇ(c0 √ó c0)))=((ordTop ` `' ‚â§)[|`t]c0))
  ordtrest2(s1, s0, hs0, `' ‚â§, c0, cxr, wtru)
  eqtri(cxr, dom(`' ‚â§), ran(‚â§))
  lern()
  df-rn(cle)
  a1i(wtru, `' ‚â§ ‚àà TosetRel)
  ax-mp(`' ‚â§ ‚àà TosetRel, ‚â§ ‚àà TosetRel)
  cnvtsr(cle)
  a1i(wtru, c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù*)
  adantl(wtru, (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s1[`' ‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[`' ‚â§]s0)} ‚äÜ c0)
  eqsstrd({ hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s1[`' ‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[`' ‚â§]s0)}, c0, { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s0[‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]s1)}, (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  rabbidva(hs0, cxr, (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (s1[`' ‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[`' ‚â§]s0), (s0[‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]s1))
  syl6bb(((s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), (s1[`' ‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[`' ‚â§]s0), (s0[‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]s1), (hs0[‚â§]s1 ‚àß s0[‚â§]hs0))
  anbi12d(((s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), s1[`' ‚â§]hs0, hs0[`' ‚â§]s0, hs0[‚â§]s1, s0[‚â§]hs0)
  adantlr(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, (s1[`' ‚â§]hs0 ‚Üî hs0[‚â§]s1))
  brcnvg(s1, c0, hs0, cxr, cle)
  syl2anc(((s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), (hs0[`' ‚â§]s0 ‚Üî s0[‚â§]hs0), hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, s0 ‚àà c0)
  simpr((s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  simplr(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  brcnvg(hs0, cxr, s0, c0, cle)
  ancom(hs0[‚â§]s1, s0[‚â§]hs0)
  eqsstr3d({ hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s0[‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]s1)}, c0, (s0[[,]]s1), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  syl2anc((s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (s0[[,]]s1)= { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s0[‚â§]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]s1)}, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  sseldi(s0, cxr, c0, (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  simpr(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c0)
  sseldi(s1, cxr, c0, (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  simpl(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c0)
  iccval(hs0, s0, s1)
  ancoms(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c0, (s0[[,]]s1)‚äÜ c0)
  oveq1i((ordTop ` `' ‚â§), crest, c0, (ordTop ` ‚â§))
  ax-mp((ordTop ` `' ‚â§)=(ordTop ` ‚â§), ‚â§ ‚àà PosetRel)
  ax-mp(‚â§ ‚àà PosetRel, ‚â§ ‚àà TosetRel)
  letsr()
  tsrps(cle)
  ordtcnv(cle)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(`' ‚â§)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
}

blocks.name: prsdm
blocks.content: Domain of the relation of a proset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prsdm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cproset), wceq(cdm(c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cdm(c1), c2, wcel(c0, cproset))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), cdm(c1), cdm(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  dmeqi(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  impbid1(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  elind(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0)))
  prsref(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  df-br(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))
  sylancom(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cxp(c2, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs0), c2)
  spcev(hs1, cv(hs0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  exlimiv(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c2, c2)))
  sseli(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c2, c2))
  inss2(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))
  opelxp1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2, c2)
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cproset))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm prsdm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Proset ‚Üí dom(c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, dom(c1), c2, c0 ‚àà Proset)
  syl5bb(c0 ‚àà Proset, hs0 ‚àà dom(c1), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà dom(((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2))))
  eleq2i(hs0, dom(c1), dom(((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2))))
  dmeqi(c1, ((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)))
  syl6rbbr(c0 ‚àà Proset, hs0 ‚àà dom(((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2))), hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2))))
  impbid1(c0 ‚àà Proset, hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2))))
  ex(c0 ‚àà Proset, hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2))))
  syl((c0 ‚àà Proset ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2))), < hs0, hs0 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)))
  elind(< hs0, hs0 >, (le ` c0), (c2 √ó c2), (c0 ‚àà Proset ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà Proset ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), < hs0, hs0 > ‚àà(le ` c0), hs0[(le ` c0)]hs0)
  prsref(c0, hs0, c2, (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  df-br(hs0, (le ` c0), hs0)
  sylancom(c0 ‚àà Proset, hs0 ‚àà c2, < hs0, hs0 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c2), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà Proset, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  opelxpi(hs0, c2, hs0, c2)
  spcev(hs1, hs0, < hs0, hs0 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)))
  eleq1d(< hs0, hs1 >, ((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)), < hs0, hs0 >, hs1 = hs0)
  opeq2(hs1, hs0, hs0)
  exlimiv(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  syl(< hs0, hs1 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)), hs0 ‚àà c2, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà(c2 √ó c2))
  sseli(< hs0, hs1 >, ((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)), (c2 √ó c2))
  inss2((le ` c0), (c2 √ó c2))
  opelxp1(hs0, hs1, c2, c2)
  eldm2(hs1, hs0, ((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà Proset)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(< hs0, hs0 > ‚àà((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚àà c2)
  diff.hs1.c(((le ` c0)‚ãÇ(c2 √ó c2)))
}

blocks.content: Range of the relation of a proset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2018.)

thm prsrn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cproset), wceq(crn(c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, crn(c1), c2, wcel(c0, cproset))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), crn(c1), crn(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  rneqi(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))

  impbid1(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  elind(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0)))
  prsref(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cple, c0))

thm prsss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  adantl(wcel(c0, cproset), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cin(c3, cxp(c1, c1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c1, c1))))
  syl5eq(cin(c3, cxp(c1, c1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c1, c1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cin(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1))), wss(c1, c2))
  eqtri(cin(c3, cxp(c1, c1)), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cin(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1))), cin(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c1, c1)))
  ineq1i(c3, cxp(c1, c1), cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  inass(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1))
  ineq2d(cfv(cple, c0), cin(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1), wss(c1, c2))
  sylib(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cin(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))
  anidms(wss(c1, c2), wss(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))

  dmeqd(cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c1, c1)), cin(cfv(cple, co(c0, cress, c1)), cxp(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wss(c1, c2)))

  adantl(wcel(c0, cproset), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cple, c0), cfv(cple, co(c0, cress, c1))))
  syl(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cple, c0), cfv(cple, co(c0, cress, c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl6eqel(c1, universe, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1)), wss(c1, c2))
  fvex(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1))

  syl5eq(cfv(cordt, c1), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4)))), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(cdm(c1)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c0, cproset))

  eqid(cdm(c1))

  eqid(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))
  fveq2d(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(cdm(c1)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))))), cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4))), wcel(c0, cproset))
  fveq2d(cfi, cun(csn(cdm(c1)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))), cun(csn(c2), cun(c3, c4)), wcel(c0, cproset))
  uneq12d(csn(cdm(c1)), cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, cdm(c1), crab(s1, cdm(c1), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))), csn(c2), cun(c3, c4), wcel(c0, cproset))

thm ordtprsval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Proset ‚Üí(ordTop ` c1)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ‚ãÉ(c3 ‚ãÉ c4)))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)

  ‚ä£ c4 = ran((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c2 | ¬¨ s0[c1]s1 }))

} = {

  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Proset ‚Üí(ordTop ` c1)=(topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ‚ãÉ(c3 ‚ãÉ c4))))), d(s1, c0))
  syl5eq((ordTop ` c1), (topGen `(fi `({ c2 } ‚ãÉ(c3 ‚ãÉ c4)))), (topGen `(fi `({ dom(c1)} ‚ãÉ(ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s1[c1]s0 }))‚ãÉ ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s0[c1]s1 })))))), c0 ‚àà Proset)

  eqid(dom(c1))
  eqid(ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s1[c1]s0 })))
  eqid(ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s0[c1]s1 })))

  fveq2d(cfi, ({ dom(c1)} ‚ãÉ(ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s1[c1]s0 }))‚ãÉ ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s0[c1]s1 })))), ({ c2 } ‚ãÉ(c3 ‚ãÉ c4)), c0 ‚àà Proset)
  uneq12d({ dom(c1)}, (ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s1[c1]s0 }))‚ãÉ ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s0[c1]s1 }))), { c2 }, (c3 ‚ãÉ c4), c0 ‚àà Proset)
  sneqd(dom(c1), c2, c0 ‚àà Proset)

  mpteq12dv(s0, dom(c1), { s1 ‚àà dom(c1)| ¬¨ s0[c1]s1 }, c2, { s1 ‚àà c2 | ¬¨ s0[c1]s1 }, c0 ‚àà Proset)

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Proset ‚Üí c1 = ‚ãÉ({ c1 } ‚ãÉ(c2 ‚ãÉ c3)))

  3eqtr4d(c1, ‚ãÉ({ c1 } ‚ãÉ(c2 ‚ãÉ c3)), ‚ãÉ({ dom(c4)} ‚ãÉ(ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c4)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c4)| ¬¨ s1[c4]s0 }))‚ãÉ ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c4)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c4)| ¬¨ s0[c4]s1 })))), ‚ãÉ({ c1 } ‚ãÉ(ran((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ s1[c4]s0 }))‚ãÉ ran((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ s0[c4]s1 })))), c0 ‚àà Proset)

  sneqd(dom(c4), c1, c0 ‚àà Proset)
  uneq12d(ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c4)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c4)| ¬¨ s1[c4]s0 })), ran((s0 ‚àà dom(c4)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà dom(c4)| ¬¨ s0[c4]s1 })), ran((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ s1[c4]s0 })), ran((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ s0[c4]s1 })), c0 ‚àà Proset)

  mpteq12dv(s0, dom(c4), { s1 ‚àà dom(c4)| ¬¨ s1[c4]s0 }, c1, { s1 ‚àà c1 | ¬¨ s1[c4]s0 }, c0 ‚àà Proset)
  rabeqbidv(s1, dom(c4), c1, c0 ‚àà Proset, ¬¨ s1[c4]s0, ¬¨ s1[c4]s0)

blocks.name: ordtrestNEW
blocks.content: The subspace topology of an order topology is in general finer than the topology generated by the restricted order, but we do have inclusion in one direction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordtrestNEW(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(cordt, cin(c3, cxp(c1, c1))), co(cfv(cordt, c3), crest, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

blocks.name: ordtrest2NEW
blocks.content: An interval-closed set ` A ` in a total order has the same subspace topology as the restricted order topology. (An interval-closed set is the same thing as an open or half-open or closed interval in ` RR ` , but in other sets like ` QQ ` there are interval-closed sets like ` ( _pi , +oo ) i^i QQ ` that are not intervals.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordtrest2NEW(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cordt, cin(c0, cxp(c1, c1))), co(cfv(cordt, c0), crest, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cin(cfv(cple, c3), cxp(c2, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ctos))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wss(crab(s2, c2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))), c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)

blocks.name: ordtconnlem1
blocks.content: Connectedness in the order topology of a toset. This is the "easy" direction of ~ ordtconn . See also ~ reconnlem1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordtconnlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctos), wss(c1, c2)), wi(wcel(co(c3, crest, c1), cconn), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cordt, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

blocks.content: Connectedness in the order topology of a complete uniform totally ordered space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Sep-2018.)
